subject: Re: how to name the letters
msgSnippet: Yes, Tim, I like your ideas here. In fact, my own set of letter names mostly uses the Senior abbreviations, though in some cases I diverge from that in order
messageBody:
Yes, Tim, I like your ideas here. In fact, my own set of letter names mostly uses the Senior abbreviations, though in some cases I diverge from that in order to avoid ambiguity: so TOT instead of TO, FEE instead of FOR. I thought it made a lot of sense to use the standard abbreviations to offer some savings in effort to new learners, but the exceptions that I then added in seem to lessen that appeal.
 
All the Best,
 
Scott
